类 CollectionSelectionText

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.menu.collectionselection.CollectionSelectionText
所有已实现的接口:
Drawable
public class CollectionSelectionText extends Object implements Drawable
Represents the text components displayed in the collection selection menu. Includes labels for collection metadata and an optional message for unavailable previews. Implements Drawable for rendering text on the screen.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    final BoundedString
    nullJacket
    Message displayed when no jacket preview is available for the selected collection.
    final BoundedString
    selectionName
    Displays the name of the selected collection.

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g2d)
      Renders the collection selection text components on the screen. Updates text content based on the current user's data for the selected collection and level.
      指定者:
      render 在接口中 Drawable
      参数:
      g2d - the Graphics2D object used for rendering
